oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Legal Factors Involved in Clinical Investigations
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Geyer, Richard
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Bureau of Veterinary Medicine
regulations
FDA General Counsel
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: My discussion will be based primarily on my experience with and knowledge of the foregoing factors gained in (a) advising the bureau on the adoption, deletion or change in the regulations, guidelines, etc. that establish the requirements for studies that are to be done, and (b) reviewing the individual NADA approval files. In the process, I intend to explain what the lawyers in FDA General Counsel look for.
